name: FileProtectionType
desc: Protection level values that can be associated with a file attribute key.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a file protection type value.

items.name: static let complete: FileProtectionType
items.desc: The file is stored in an encrypted format on disk and cannot be read from or written to while the device is locked or booting.

items.name: static let completeUnlessOpen: FileProtectionType
items.desc: The file is stored in an encrypted format on disk after it is closed.

items.name: static let completeUntilFirstUserAuthentication: FileProtectionType
items.desc: The file is stored in an encrypted format on disk and cannot be accessed until after the device has booted.

items.name: static let none: FileProtectionType
items.desc: The file has no special protections associated with it.
